translations: 需要手巧的（ fiddly 的比较级）
要求高精度的（ fiddly 的比较级）

sentences.sentence: Fiddlier issues require more clarity, too.
But when it comes to building the input parameters, things get a bit fiddlier.
sentences.translation: 但是在建立输入参数时需要一点技巧。

sentences.sentence: They are also well equipped to structure the fiddlier bits of deals and to guide the integration of partners from different cultures.
sentences.translation: 他们同时充分准备去组合一些高难度的交易并指导不同文化背景合作者的融合。
